name: @sonar/seal
description: Reusable Mysten Seal encryption SDK for SONAR Protocol and beyond

scripts.build: bash -c 'tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm || (echo "tsup failed, falling back to esbuild..." && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.js --packages=external && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.mjs --packages=external && tsc --declaration --declarationMap --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist)'
scripts.build:with-types: bash -c 'tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts || (echo "tsup failed, falling back to esbuild..." && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.js --packages=external && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.mjs --packages=external && tsc --declaration --declarationMap --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist)'

author: SONAR Protocol
